item.description:
This is Governor Malloy's Town Hall Meeting that was originally scheduled for the Lincoln Center Hearing Room.  He changed the venue for many of his town hall meeting across the state.  See http://bit.ly/e3AzeC for the full list of changed venues

Arrive there by 5:30. Bring signs.

If you want to speak go right to the microphones.

See you there.

Bill Garrell
item.how_to_find_us: Outside of SBM Charitable Foundation Auditorium
item.why:
We need to let the Governor know how we feel about his increase in taxes; A good sign would be:
Coupon Tax Taxed on cash Not spent
item.name: *change of venue* Gov. Malloy's Town Hall Meeting
